title: more % health dmg items?
body: I feel like there should be more than Bork and Liandray's for % health because there isn't much variety and it makes it hard to beat tanks. Just my opinion though please don't get mad at me in the comments because that happens all the time.

replies.body:
That's are all you need for % hp, because last whisper and all that melts tanks anyway, 8% hp actually isn't that much if the enemy has 300 armor.

Pretend they have 1k hp and 300 armor.

8% of the 1k hp on first hit is 125 with 0% resistance, with the 75% resistance form 300 armor, its only around 30 damage (31.25) then half that if the enemy has 50% hp (15.625) the thing that really kills tanks is the armor pen
